title: Constructivist Online Psychology Practice Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental psychology theories and practical work experience
context.additional_context: Mobile-optimized course for enhancing job application competencies of in-service professionals

learning_goals: Learners can apply psychological theories to practical cases using self-regulated learning strategies
Learners can engage in collaborative problem-solving activities with peers through a constructivist approach
Learners can design psychological intervention plans applicable to real work environments through project-based assessments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
